text: ql -ayha alrasul lhwla' almshrkyn-: ay shay' 'aezam shahadatan fi 'iithbat sdqy fima akhbrtkm bih 'aniy rasul allh? ql: allah shahid bayni wabaynakum ay: hu alealam bima jitukum bih wama 'antum qaylwnh ly, wawha allah 'ily hdha alquran min ajl 'an 'undhirukum bih eadhabah 'an yhll bkm, wa'andhir bih man wasal 'iilayh min alamm. 'iinakum ltqrwn 'ana mae allah mebwdat 'ukhraa tshrkwnha bh. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'iiniy laa 'ashhad ealaa ma 'aqrartum bh, 'iinama allah 'ilh wahid la sharik lh, wa'iinani bari' min kuli sharik tebdwnh meh
